85666.市街のいたる所に しかばねが転がり\n時々 亡霊のように うつろな人間とすれ違う:
Dead bodies lay everywhere around the city,
and I sometimes pass people with a dead look
in their eyes. Linjahar is a living hell...

85667.中央塔で対面した 召喚士リンジャーラの目は\nぬけがらのように生気がなく その姿:
In the central tower, the eyes of the summoner
Linjara were as dead as dirt... even my master
couldn't hide his shock.

85668.しかし 主は 懸命に ご友人を励まされた。\nこの宝珠の持つ 強大なチカラで と:
But the Lord tried hard encouraging his friend.
"With the power of this jewel, together we shall save the lives of Linjahar's people..."

85669.その言葉で リンジャーラの瞳に光が宿るのを\n私は見た。その後 彼は 寝る間も惜:
And with those words, I finally saw a light in
Linjara's eyes. He spent every waking moment
searching a way to harness the jewel's power.

85670.そのかいあって 数ヶ月後には 疫病は駆逐され\nそれどころか 海洋都市は 宝珠の:
The plague was eradicated in a matter of
months, and the city grew at an unprecedented
rate thanks to the jewel's power.

85671.その 急激とも言える勢いは\n二度と あの地獄をくり返させないという\nリンジャ:
That sudden burst of momentum showed Linjara's
true determination in not repeating that hell
he had gone through.
